Corporation</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_Description__c</attrName><attrType>text</attrType><attrValue>MarkLogic Corporation, an enterprise software company, provides solutions to the public sector and Global 1000 companies around the world. It offers MarkLogic 5, a database for managing and leveraging big data and unstructured information; Application Builder, which enables organizations to build information applications using a browser-based GUI for users to search and discover unstructured information; Information Studio, which simplifies loading and optimizing unstructured information to be stored in MarkLogic 5; productivity tools for Microsoft Office applications; Hadoop Connector, which enables real time analytics on structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data; consulting, training, and support services; and common repository, metadata catalog, digital content delivery, information intelligence, and social applications. The company serves media, financial services, video library, aviation, manufacturing, healthcare, and other industries. MarkLogic Corporation was founded in 2001 and is based in San Carlos, California with field offices in Austin, Boston, Frankfurt, London, Tokyo, New York, and Washington D.C.</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_Email__c</attrName><attrType>email</attrType><attrValue>ruth.stryker@marklogic.com</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_Employees__c</attrName><attrType>integer</attrType><attrValue>260</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_Phone__c</attrName><attrType>phone</attrType><attrValue>650.287.2524</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_Phone__c_account</attrName><attrType>phone</attrType><attrValue>+1.650.655.2300</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_SIC_Code__c</attrName><attrType>string</attrType><attrValue>7371</attrValue></attribute><attribute><attrName>DC_SIC_Description__c</attrName><attrType>string</attrType><attrValue>Software
